name: Lakshitha

address: Flat No.435, Block No.8, Manasarovar Heights, Phase III
Behind Hasmathpet Monda Market, Near Leela Gardens, RTC Colony, Tirumalagiri

briefDescription: Lakshitha...on earth for a meaningful purpose (earlier known as Cheyutha) started its operations way back in the year 2002.  Lakshitha carries out various activities for the welfare of under-privileged children of the society viz., children beloning to slum areas, studying in govt schools, construction workers, parents migrated to urban areas in search of livelihood.  Major activities include - sponsorship of education, educational trips to science centres / zoological parks, historical monuments, conducting of magic shows, drawing competitions, vedic mathematics quiz and many more.  More than 1000 children from various sections of the society have been benefited till now.
